name: Antiques Master
description:
The greatest risks always bring the greatest profits, but only a small percentage of the world will ever dare to take those risks in fear of great loss!

Hopeful vendors are lining up to make a deal with you. But before you buy from them, use your bargaining skills to lower the price as much as possible. Be careful, though! Some items could be fake or have serious defects! Can you spot these problems before you make your final deal?

Your business is not limited to gold, antique guns, jewelry, and old masters artwork. You can trade anything and everything for profit. Use your negotiation skills and attention to detail to convince people to give you a better price. They're in desperate need of money, and only you can provide what they are looking for.

Let's make a deal!
